column4: how does the kernel versioning work?  (ie, in linux-image-2.6.15-26.46, what are the numbers "26" and "46" for, exactly?)
hmm.. here's a tough call - is it faster to install Knot 1 and fully upgrade over the network, or download Knot 2 and upgrade? :)
Knot 2's probably racked up too many updates to be worth it now, I guess
edgy updates so often it doesn't matter, you'll be doing large updates over network anyways
